quotes.quote: Remember, there's no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: True beauty is a warm heart, a kind soul, and an attentive ear.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Touching the lives of others is one of the best things you can do in life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't wish... DO! Don't try... BE! Don't think... KNOW! And above all: Bless a stranger with a small, yet powerful, random act of kindness. You feel me?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The knowing ones must have pity on the ignorant. One who knows is willing to give up his body even for an ant, because he knows that the body is nothing.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Smile often. Make life easier for others.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never let the day end without showing appreciation to someone, even if it's only yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: No matter what the hatred is, preserve the possibility of peace and always have room for forgiveness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: One act of small kindness can release an enormous chain of positive events.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Compassion heals wounds and builds bridges.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Respect for ourselves guides our morals; respect for others guides our manners.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: You'll never regret being kind to people.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Showing kindness towards those who are different and embracing our imperfections as proof of our humanness is the remedy for fear.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the people who are kind to your heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Do things for people not because of who they are or what they do in return, but because of who you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Push someone's happy button with a kind word.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The world needs more gratitude and kindness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Be a little kinder than you have to.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: Change the world with a kind heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Our kindness may be the most persuasive argument for that which we believe.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The peace and happiness you give to others will always make their way back to you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only people who deserve to be in your life are the ones who treat you with love, kindness, and respect.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Kindness can transform someone's dark moment with a blaze of light. You'll never know how much your caring matters. Make a difference for another today.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Gratitude drowns out negativity and brings positivity into our lives.
quotes.author: Lewis Howes

quotes.quote: One kind word can change someone's entire day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never lose a chance of saying a kind word.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Keep growing. Be a good human.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A good mood can be contagious; be the carrier of lightheartedness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Peace often comes to those seeking a kinder path.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Everyone responds to kindness.
quotes.author: Richard Gere

quotes.quote: Where there is forgiveness, there is always love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In the end, only kindness matters.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Today's goal: positive thoughts. Compassionate actions. Inner peace.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Plant kindness. Grow compassion. Harvest love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Leave everyone you meet happier and better for having crossed your path.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you want your life to stand for peace and kindness, it's helpful to do kind, peaceful things.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: For today, think positive thoughts, believe in yourself and others, share hugs, and spread love. That's it - nothing else.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Be thankful for your life, and forgive everybody, including yourself.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Never pass up an opportunity to let someone know how much you appreciate them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Because that's what kindness is. It's not doing something for someone else because they can't, but because you can.
quotes.author: Andrew Iskander

quotes.quote: Treat yourself with kindness. You deserve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Dance through life flinging kindness like shimmering rainbows. Find your bliss by sharing your heart.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Kindness is a habit of giving. It humanizes us; it lifts us spiritually. And it is good for us.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Live without pretending, love without depending, listen without defending, speak without offending.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Give someone a hug.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Sprinkle appreciation throughout your day. The people around you will bloom under your gratitude.
quotes.author: Unknown
